title: Winter Harvest
description: Kevin Furmage was a visionary, whose burning obsession was to make his mark upon the world by blazing a new route to California over the mountains. In his wagon-train were an ill assorted group of people, some honest and God-fearing, some brutal and selfish. These were the people faced, not only with appalling hardship, but also with the problem of living with one another on the Road to Revelation.
author: Norah Lofts
